1.0.name: wordpress/minepic
1.0.description:
THIS PLUGIN IS A MODIFICATION OF MINOTAR. All the code were written by the authors of the minotar plugin!

Minepic allow you to replace wordpress avatars with Minecraft avatars, pick taken from http://minepic.org/

Features:

  • Minecraft avatars for commenters and users
  • BuddyPress support
